Article Title: MS Dhoni finally loses cool after CSK loss, says 'you can't just keep ... '
Article Text:
Image credit: BCCI/IPL

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Poll Should CSK consider making major changes to their lineup? No, they should stick with current players Yes, it's necessary

Sachin Tendulkar at 52: Power, Pride, and a Nation‚Äôs Pulse

The expression on captain Mahendra Singh Dhoni ‚Äôs face said it all as Chennai Super Kings suffered another defeat‚Äîthis time a five-wicket loss to Sunrisers Hyderabad at the MA Chidambaram Stadium in Chennai on Friday. A visibly disappointed Dhoni admitted that a total of 154 was far from ‚Äújustifiable‚Äù on a Chepauk pitch that didn‚Äôt have any demons, as SRH dealt a near-fatal blow to CSK‚Äôs IPL 2025 play-off chances.Also See: DC vs RCB IPL Live Score Sunrisers chased down the modest target in just 18.4 overs. Dhoni pointed out that it's always tough when several players fail to deliver simultaneously.He also believed that SRH batted under slightly tougher conditions in the second innings, yet CSK couldn't capitalise. For the skipper, the lack of cohesion in the team's overall effort was most frustrating."I think we kept losing wickets and another thing is in the first innings the wicket was slightly better and 157 wasn't a justifiable score," Dhoni said after CSK‚Äôs loss."It wasn't turning a lot, a little two-paced but nothing out of the ordinary. Yes, second innings there was a bit of help. Our spinners, the quality was there and they were bowling in the right areas, but we were 15-20 runs short," he added.Commenting on Dewald Brevis‚Äô performance, Dhoni said, "[On Brevis] I think he batted really well and we needed that in the middle order. When the spinners come in, you do it either by batsmanship or picking the right areas, but that's an area where we want to improve because middle overs are crucial."Reflecting on the broader issues plaguing the team, Dhoni didn‚Äôt hold back."In a tournament like this, if there are one or two areas to plug in the holes it's good, but when a majority of the players are not doing well you need to make changes. You can't just keep going. We are just not putting enough runs on the board," he said.With this win, SRH have moved up to eighth place on the points table, registering three wins and six losses for a total of six points.CSK, meanwhile, sit at the bottom with just two wins from nine games and only four points to show.
Article Summary: Chennai super kings lost by five wickets to sunrisers hyderabad on friday. Captain mahendra singh dhoni said csk's total of 154 was not "justifiable" dhoni also said the team's lack of cohesion was most frustrating.

Article Title: ‚ÄúI would have called off the wedding‚Äù: Fans urge Josh Allen to rethink wedding after Hailee Steinfeld‚Äôs steamy chemistry with Michael B. Jordan
Article Text: Hailee Steinfeld and Josh Allen's engagement is now facing fan speculation due to Steinfeld's sizzling onscreen chemistry with Michael B. Jordan in 'Sinners.' Despite the buzz, Steinfeld has expressed her love for Buffalo and her connection to the city.

Article Title: New Record! Prabhsimran Singh becomes first uncapped Punjab Kings batter to ...
Article Text:
Punjab Kings' Prabhsimran Singh plays a shot at the Eden Gardens. (PTI Photo)

Also visit:

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Do you think Prabhsimran Singh will continue to be a key player for Punjab Kings this season? He will improve further It's hard to say No, he might struggle Yes, absolutely

Sachin Tendulkar at 52: Power, Pride, and a Nation‚Äôs Pulse

NEW DELHI: Prabhsimran Singh etched his name into Punjab Kings ' history books on Saturday, becoming the first uncapped batter from the franchise to cross the 1000-run milestone in the Indian Premier League . The young opener achieved the landmark during his scintillating knock of 83 off 49 balls against Kolkata Knight Riders at Eden Gardens.Prabhsimran‚Äôs innings, studded with six sixes and six fours, was instrumental in powering Punjab Kings to a commanding 201 for 4 after skipper Shreyas Iyer won the toss and opted to bat first. The Patiala-born batter stitched a brilliant 120-run opening stand with Priyansh Arya , who blazed away to a 35-ball 69, laying the perfect foundation for a big total.With Saturday‚Äôs innings, Prabhsimran now has 1048 runs from 43 matches, including one century and five fifties for PBKS. He surpassed former Punjab batter Manan Vohra , who previously held the record among uncapped players with 957 runs in 45 games.The 24-year-old has grown into a crucial pillar for Punjab‚Äôs top order and remains central to their title ambitions this season. His consistency has been particularly crucial, with Punjab aiming for their maiden IPL crown.Among current PBKS players, Shashank Singh follows with 512 runs in 23 matches, while former stars Paul Valthaty (499 runs in 21 matches) and Shahrukh Khan (426 runs in 33 matches) round out the list.Meanwhile, Prabhsimran‚Äôs new opening partner Priyansh Arya continues to impress in his debut IPL season, already amassing 323 runs in nine games, further strengthening Punjab‚Äôs top order for the playoff push.
Article Summary: Prabhsimran singh becomes the first uncapped batter from punjab kings to cross the 1000-run milestone in the indian premier league. The young opener achieved the landmark during his scintillating knock of 83 off 49 balls against kolkata knight riders at eden gardens.

Article Title: Michael Strahan stands by FOX Sports‚Äô Jay Glazer through a heartbreaking time days after announcing his new venture
Article Text:
Michael Strahan is partnering with Michael Vick.(Image via Michael Le Brecht II/ABC via Getty)

Michael Strahan proves he is there for his FOX Sports‚Äô colleague as he goes through a tough time



Is Michael Strahan taking on a new responsibility?



Michael Strahan, the NFL legend and the host of Good Morning America, has taken on a new career along with hosting. Recently, the NFL legend announced his new venture but amidst all the excitement, Michael Strahan paid a tribute to FOX Sports ‚Äô NFL Insider, Jay Glazer‚Äôs heartfelt tribute to his father. FOX Sports‚Äô Jay Glazer recently took to his social media to post about his father in a heartbreaking post but it was Michael Strahan‚Äôs comment that showed how much he cares about his colleagues.FOX Sports‚Äô Jay Glazer posted a heartbreaking picture of a black coffin that carried his father, a few hours ago. The caption for the post read as, ‚ÄúTake care dad. Beautiful day, beautiful turnout, I‚Äôm sure he loved it!! RIP Ed Glazer. Love ya big guy.‚ÄùThe NFL legend, Michael Strahan dropped a heartwarming comment that read as, ‚Äú‚ù§Ô∏èüôè‚Äù, as a way to show support to his colleague.A few days ago FOX Sports‚Äô Jay Glazer announced his father‚Äôs demise with a happy picture of his father and a heartbreaking caption.The caption read as, ‚ÄúDuring our visit, he said knew he was heading to the other side, I asked if he good with it. He was‚Ä¶We had a really good goodbye. I get to remember THAT, which is a gift. Pretty surreal conversation. But I was able to leave him with gratitude.‚ÄùA few days ago, Michael Strahan announced his new venture for which he is teaming up with former NFL player, Michael Vick , to create a documentary on Vick‚Äôs new life at Norfolk State University where he would be joining as a head coach for their football team.Michael Strahan‚Äôs SMAC Entertainment will be partnering with BET Media Group for this documentary.Michael Strahan spoke about his new venture and said, ‚ÄúI know first-hand the power that HBCUS have on a community and the opportunity they give to so many student-athletes.‚ÄùHe added, ‚ÄúMichael Vick‚Äôs commitment to impacting these young men‚Äôs lives and passing along the gifts that football provided to him is so inspiring. I‚Äôm excited for fans to join on his journey with Norfolk State University.‚ÄùAt the moment, Michael Strahan is spending all his time with his children after his daughter, Isabella Strahan recently recovered from brain cancer.Michael Strahan has also appeared with Isabella Strahan in many interviews as he teared up while recollecting the mental toll his daughter‚Äôs illness had on him.Despite being divorced from his ex wife, Michael Strahan and her came together to be with their daughter as she fought a tough battle against cancer. Isabella Strahan has now fully recovered from cancer and has gone back to college at the University of Southern California.Michael Strahan's daughter, Isabella Strahan, was recently spotted enjoying her time in Coachella with her close friends. She was also vacationing in the Bahamas a few weeks ago with her twin sister, Sophia Strahan and their close friends. The 20 year old went back to college at the University of Southern California in August 2024 and has been continuing with her studies.Also Read: Lil Wayne shocks fans with new NFL announcement days after slamming the league over Super Bowl halftime snub
Article Summary: Michael strahan is partnering with michael vick. The nfl legend and the host of good morning america, has taken on a new career along with hosting. Recently, the nfl legend announced his new venture but amidst all the excitement, michael strahan paid a tribute to his fox sports colleague.

Article Title: IPL 2025 Points Table: Latest standings after KKR vs PBKS match at Eden Gardens in Kolkata
Article Text:
KKR vs PBKS match called off at Eden Gardens. (Pic credit: IPL)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Here's the latest

IPL 2025 points table

after the

KKR vs PBKS

match:

NEW DELHI: The Indian Premier League 2025 clash between Kolkata Knight Riders and Punjab Kings at Eden Gardens was abandoned due to persistent rain on Saturday, marking the first match of the season to end without a result.KKR had just begun their chase of a daunting 202-run target and were 7 for no loss after one over when heavy rain halted proceedings. Despite an extended wait of nearly 90 minutes, the weather showed no signs of improvement, forcing the officials to call off the match.With the 'No Result', both teams shared a point each. Punjab Kings climbed to fourth place in the standings with 11 points from nine matches (five wins, three losses, one no result), boosting their playoff hopes. Kolkata Knight Riders remained seventh with seven points from nine games (three wins, five losses, one no result).Earlier, Punjab Kings put up an impressive 201 for 4, powered by stunning half-centuries from Priyansh Arya and Prabhsimran Singh . The pair added a blazing 120-run opening stand in just 11.5 overs. Arya hammered 69 off 35 balls, while Prabhsimran struck a commanding 83 off 49 deliveries.KKR bowlers, led by Vaibhav Arora (2/34) and Andre Russell (1/27), fought back well in the final overs to stem the run flow.
Article Summary: The indian premier league 2025 clash between kolkata knight riders and punjab kings at eden gardens was abandoned due to persistent rain on saturday. It is the first match of the season to end without a result. Punjab kings climbed to fourth place in the standings with 11 points from nine matches (five wins, three losses, one no result)

Article Title: Buccaneers sign 464-pound Desmond Watson, the heaviest player in NFL history, as undrafted free agent
Article Text:
Undrafted and 464 pounds, Desmond Watson gets NFL opportunity with the Tampa Bay Buccaneers (Credit: AP Photos)

Desmond Watson signs with Buccaneers, becomes heaviest player ever to join an NFL team



After going undrafted in the 2025 NFL Draft, Desmond Watson , one of the Florida Gators ' most beloved fan favorites, has landed a spot with the Tampa Bay Buccaneers . The towering 6-foot-5, 464-pound defensive tackle inked an undrafted free agent contract with the Buccaneers just moments after the draft ended, marking him as the team's first UDFA signing. The contract includes a $20,000 signing bonus and $50,000 in guaranteed money, offering Watson a strong foundation as he embarks on his NFL journey.Desmond Watson's unique combination of size and skill makes him a standout figure in the NFL. At 464 pounds, Watson now holds the record as the heaviest player in NFL history , surpassing the previous record set by offensive tackle Aaron Gibson by an impressive 54 pounds. Watson joins a talented group of nose tackles in Tampa Bay, including Vita Vea and Greg Gaines. Over his collegiate career, Watson accumulated 63 tackles, 1.5 sacks, and a memorable forced fumble and recovery in 2022, which cemented his place in Gators history.Though Watson was not invited to the NFL Scouting Combine, his performance at Florida's Pro Day captured the attention of scouts. He clocked an impressive 5.95-second 40-yard dash, making him the third slowest runner of all time at his size but still managing to impress those in attendance. Additionally, Watson's 36 reps on the bench press would have been the highest at the Combine, demonstrating his raw strength and athleticism despite his considerable size.Tampa Bay's head coach, Billy Napier, praised Watson‚Äôs exceptional abilities. "He's a unicorn. That stature," Napier said at the Pro Day. "And then, you get to know Des. He's extremely intelligent. He's got a great sense of humor. He was a great teammate. Obviously showed up in good shape (for pro day). He'll get his shot, and I'm hoping he'll make the most of it."What makes Watson's journey even more remarkable is his hometown connection to Tampa Bay. Born and raised in Plant City, Florida, Watson will now have the opportunity to play just hours away from where he made his mark both in high school at Armwood and in college with the Gators. This proximity adds an extra layer of excitement as he competes for a spot on the Buccaneers' roster, with the potential to play in front of a familiar Florida crowd in the NFL.While Watson's weight has been a topic of discussion throughout his career, it‚Äôs clear he has made significant strides. Prior to the draft, Watson spoke about his weight management efforts: "There (are) times where I do basically starving and stuff like that... I didn‚Äôt feel confident that way. I didn‚Äôt feel strong, I didn‚Äôt feel fast. I feel like right now is the best I felt with the process of losing weight."Watson‚Äôs commitment to fitness has been evident as he worked with a weight and fitness specialist leading up to the draft. His goal of losing approximately 100 pounds was achieved through a disciplined diet that cut out sugar and starches, relying on peas, beans, chili, and spinach as key components of his meals.As the Buccaneers continue to strengthen their roster, Watson's signing marks a significant opportunity for him to prove himself. The team had already bolstered their edge rushing corps with two new signings in the 2025 draft but left room for a potential interior defensive lineman. With no other interior D-linemen drafted, Watson's chance to compete for a backup role behind Pro Bowler Vita Vea is very much alive.Desmond Watson's path to the NFL may have been unconventional, but his hard work, dedication, and Florida roots have given him the chance to shine at the highest level of football. Whether or not he secures a starting position, one thing is clear‚ÄîWatson‚Äôs journey is just beginning, and fans across Florida will be cheering him on every step of the way.Also Read: "Clueless for 50 years": ESPN‚Äôs Mel Kiper Jr. slams NFL teams for letting Shedeur Sanders slip to fifth round
Article Summary: Desmond watson, a 6-foot-5, 464-pound defensive tackle, is the heaviest player ever to join an nfl team. Watson was not invited to the nfl scouting combine, but his performance at florida's pro day captured the attention of scouts. Watson joins a talented group of nose tackles in tampa bay including vita vea and greg gaines.

Article Title: George Russell on surpassing Lewis Hamilton in Driver Standings: ‚ÄúThere was a time that if you finished ahead of him in a race, you‚Äôd win the race‚Äù
Article Text:
Image credit: George Russell/Instagram

When George Russell was Lewis Hamilton's teammate at Mercedes

George Russell and Lewis Hamilton were teammates at Mercedes until last year. But the times have changed drastically, as Hamilton has now switched to Ferrari , where he is yet to find his footing. Meanwhile, Russell is having a fantastic season and is just one position away from clinching his first win of the season, if McLaren misses the mark by chance. The roaring Mercedes driver has now said that if it was a different era, he would have already won two championships.George Russell was reflecting on his past years at Mercedes when Lewis Hamilton was leading the World Championship. He stresses that it‚Äôs not him who has changed, but the times. Russell was two positions ahead of Hamilton in the Driver Standings when he joined Mercedes in 2022, and once again left him behind in 2024 when Hamilton started losing his winning streak.Talking about his time with Hamilton, Russell told The Athletic, ‚ÄúEverybody is in Lewis‚Äôs shadow. Being teammates with a seven-time World Champion for three years is not straightforward. There was once a time that if you finished ahead of Lewis Hamilton in a championship or in a race, you‚Äôd win the race. Or, if you finished ahead of him in the championship, you‚Äôd win the championship. If my time was five years prior, you could argue I‚Äôd have two championships to my name.‚ÄùAt present, Russell is in 4th place, while Hamilton, who now drives for Ferrari, is way behind in 7th in the Driver Standings. Opening up about the same, Russell said, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm just going about my business, as I have been the last couple of years. I‚Äôm working with the same group of engineers, the same group of mechanics. Obviously, Lewis was such a large presence that you know that he‚Äôs not around.‚Äù‚ÄúBut on the day-to-day running of things, it is no different. I'm sat at my desk in front of my computer. I do my warm-up in my room, I jump in my race car, I put my helmet on. I want to control my own destiny first and foremost," he added.Also Read: George Russell: George Russell seen in super-rare $5.4 million Mercedes AMG One with Alex Albon in Monaco Russell has claimed three podiums in five races and is currently the only one, other than Red Bull‚Äôs Max Verstappen, giving McLaren a tough competition. It may simply be a matter of time before he manages to surpass Oscar Piastri, Lando Norris, and Verstappen to clinch a win.
Article Summary: When george russell was lewis hamilton's teammate at mercedes, he won two championships. But the times have changed drastically, as hamilton has now switched to ferrari. Russell is having a fantastic season and is just one position away from clinching his first win of the season.

Article Title: Copa del Rey final: Barcelona edge Real Madrid in extra-time to win domestic title for 32nd time
Article Text:
Barcelona edged Real Madrid in extra time to win the Copa del Rey for a record-extending 32nd time. (AP)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

End to end

Seville: Barcelona defender Jules Kounde struck deep in extra-time to decide a gripping Copa del Rey Clasico final on Saturday in Seville, earning his side a 3-2 win over rivals Real Madrid .The Catalans, aiming for a quadruple this season, won the first major trophy of Hansi Flick's reign as coach and a record-extending 32nd Spanish cup in dramatic fashion.Three Real Madrid players were sent off during and after a fiery conclusion to the game, including England international Jude Bellingham.Pedri sent Barcelona ahead at La Cartuja but two Real Madrid goals in seven second-half minutes, from Kylian Mbappe and Aurelien Tchouameni, pulled the Spanish and European champions level.However, Ferran Torres struck in the 84th minute to take the game to extra-time and Kounde drilled home to win it for the La Liga leaders."Madrid pushed us to our limits but we showed great character and pride," said Kounde.Barca host Inter Milan in the Champions League semi-finals on Wednesday."They can make a party -- for today, it's OK," a delighted Flick, who has won all seven finals he has coached in his career, told Movistar.Substituted Madrid defender Antonio Rudiger was sent off in the final seconds for "throwing an object" onto the pitch towards referee Ricardo de Burgos Bengoetxea, according to the official's report, and Lucas Vazquez, also replaced, was dismissed for further protest as Madrid unravelled.Bellingham was sent off after the final whistle for showing an "aggressive attitude" towards the referee, who wrote that the midfielder "had to be restrained by his team-mates"."I don't want to talk about the referee," said stone-faced Madrid coach Ancelotti."I don't know what happened at the end." Madrid had issued furious statements about the refereeing team on Friday after they criticised the club's television channel for attacking Spanish officials this season, casting a shadow over the game.Controversy aside, the football was enthralling.Madrid started with top scorer Mbappe on the bench after an ankle injury and lost Ferland Mendy early on with a thigh issue.Barcelona dazzling winger Lamine Yamal, 17, dyed his hair blond for the game and led the assault on Thibaut Courtois' goal.The Catalans, who also won the first two Clasicos this season in La Liga and the Spanish Super Cup, scoring nine goals in the process, controlled the ball.They took the lead after 28 minutes, Pedri placing the ball into the top corner with precision and power from the edge of the box, a sensational goal set up by Yamal.Barcelona's opener brought Madrid out of their shell -- and also Mbappe off the bench to warm up.Bellingham netted but was offside. Vinicius Junior would have won a penalty when hacked down but had also strayed off in the build-up.Barcelona could have doubled their lead, with Dani Olmo's corner hitting the post and Cubarsi unable to turn home as Dani Ceballos held him back.The referee was lenient with some heated Madrid tackles, perhaps cowed by Friday's drama as the Spanish champions seethed at his pre-match comments.Madrid sent Mbappe on for Rodrygo Goes at half-time and soon he and Vinicius began to work Barcelona goalkeeper Wojciech Szczesny.Mbappe pulled Madrid level almost on his own in the 70th minute, brought down after surging forward and firing home the free-kick off the post.Seven minutes later Madrid took the lead, Tchouameni heading in Arda Guler's corner.Barcelona responded when Yamal played a delicious pass over the top for Torres, which drew both Rudiger and Courtois, but the Spaniard beat both and rolled home.Controversy unsurprisingly reared its head before the match headed to extra-time.Barcelona clamoured for a penalty when Rudiger tripped Torres, and then were awarded one deep in stoppage time as Raphinha tumbled under pressure -- but the decision was overturned after a VAR review.In extra-time Barcelona were ascendent.They found their winner when Kounde intercepted an uncharacteristically loose Luka Modric pass and beat Courtois from range, sparking wild celebrations.The trio of dismissals and Madrid's pre-match histrionics regarding the officials will ensure the repercussions run on.The teams meet again in La Liga in May in a potential title decider.
Article Summary: Barcelona beat real madrid 3-2 in the copa del rey final in seville. Jules kounde scores the winning goal in extra-time for barcelona. Three real madrid players were sent off during and after the game. Barcelona are aiming for a quadruple this season. Vinicius junior would have won a penalty when hacked down but had also strayed off in the build-up.

Article Title: Jasprit Bumrah becomes Mumbai Indians' leading wicket-taker in IPL history
Article Text:
Jasprit Bumrah (IPL Photo)

Also visit:

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Who do you think is the best bowler in IPL history? Brett Lee Harbhajan Singh Lasith Malinga Jasprit Bumrah

Most wickets for Mumbai Indians in IPL

174 - Jasprit Bumrah

170 - Laisth Malinga

127 - Harbhajan Singh

71 - Mitchell McClenaghan

69 - Kieron Pollard

65 - Hardik Pandya

Sachin Tendulkar at 52: Power, Pride, and a Nation‚Äôs Pulse

NEW DELHI: Mumbai Indians ' pace spearhead Jasprit Bumrah added another feather to his illustrious cap on Sunday, becoming the leading wicket-taker for the franchise in Indian Premier League (IPL) history. In front of a buzzing Wankhede Stadium crowd, Bumrah achieved the milestone during MI‚Äôs clash against Lucknow Super Giants.Coming on as first change in just the third over, Bumrah dismissed South African batter Aiden Markram to claim his 171st wicket for Mumbai Indians in 139 matches. With this scalp, Bumrah surpassed Sri Lankan legend Lasith Malinga , who previously held the record with 170 wickets from 122 games.Bumrah, who has played his entire IPL career with MI since debuting in 2013, has been a cornerstone of the franchise‚Äôs five-title-winning campaigns. His consistency and ability to deliver under pressure have made him one of the most feared bowlers in world cricket.Bumrah returned figures of 4 for 22 against LSG, taking his tally to 174. Riding on Bumrah's exploits, MI registered a commanding 54-run victory to record their fifth successive win of the season.Former India off-spinner Harbhajan Singh sits third on Mumbai‚Äôs all-time list with 127 wickets in 136 matches, followed by Mitchell McClenaghan (71) and Kieron Pollard (69). Current MI captain Hardik Pandya is sixth with 65 wickets.On a high-scoring day at Wankhede, Suryakumar Yadav 's blistering 54 off 28 balls and Ryan Rickelton's 58 helped MI post a daunting 215/7. Suryakumar also crossed the 400-run mark this season and became the tournament‚Äôs leading run-scorer, while also completing 4,000 IPL runs.Despite Lucknow opting to bowl first, Mumbai‚Äôs batters made merry on a batting-friendly surface, with the scoring rate consistently touching 10 runs an over.Bumrah‚Äôs record-breaking feat and MI‚Äôs late-season surge have reignited hopes of a playoff spot, as the five-time champions push towards a strong finish in IPL 2025 .
Article Summary: Jasprit bumrah becomes the leading wicket-taker for mumbai indians in ipl history. The 27-year-old claimed 171 wickets for mi in 139 matches. Bumra surpassed sri lankan legend lasith malinga, who previously held the record with 170 wickets.

Article Title: 'I bowl when I am required': Mumbai Indians skipper makes a big revelation after crushing win over LSG
Article Text:
Mumbai: Mumbai Indians' captain Hardik Pandya with teammate Corbin Bosch at the end of the Indian Premier League (IPL) 2025 cricket match between Mumbai Indians and Lucknow Super Giants, in Mumbai. Mumbai won the match by 54 runs. (PTI Photo/Shashank Parade)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Shah Rukh Khan: The superstar who turned IPL into a blockbuster

After their commanding victory over Lucknow Super Giants (LSG) at the Wankhede Stadium, Mumbai Indians captain Hardik Pandya made a noteworthy revelation about his limited bowling contribution on Sunday, having bowled only one over on Sunday.Hardik bowled the ninth over of the match. He was greeted by LSG opener Mitchell Marsh with consecutive boundaries but recovered strongly, conceding just two singles in his subsequent four deliveries.At the post-match presentation ceremony, when questioned about bowling only one over, the Mumbai Indians skipper replied, "I bowl when I am required."Hardik then elaborated on his decision to hold back and provide debutant Corbin Bosch with the opportunity to complete his quota of overs. The South African all-rounder had an excellent debut, smashing a quick-fire 20 off 10 balls and delivering an economical bowling spell of 1 for 26 in his four overs."Today was the best chance for Bosch to come in and bowl," he stated.It was indeed a clinical performance by the five-time champions, Mumbai Indians. Jasprit Bumrah 's exceptional figures of 4 for 22 and Trent Boult 's 3 for 20 followed attacking half-centuries from Ryan Rickelton and Suryakumar Yadav , propelling Mumbai Indians to a 54-run victory over Lucknow Super Giants for their fifth successive win.After Rickelton (58) and Suryakumar Yadav (54) helped MI post a formidable 215 for 7 after being asked to bat first, Bumrah and Boult spearheaded a brilliant bowling performance as LSG were bundled out for 161 in 20 overs.Bumrah weaved his magic in the death overs, claiming three wickets in one eventful over as Mumbai Indians defeated LSG for the first time at the Wankhede Stadium.Bumrah also achieved a significant milestone, becoming the highest wicket-taker for Mumbai Indians in IPL history with 174 wickets, surpassing Lasith Malinga's 170.Boult was equally impressive. Utilized in short spells, he struck every time he was brought into the attack, wrapping up the innings by dismissing Digvesh Rathi on the last ball of the match.This victory marks the first win for Mumbai Indians over LSG in the league phase, coming in their seventh encounter.With this win, MI climbed to the second spot in the standings, trailing Gujarat Titans and joining Delhi Capitals and Royal Challengers Bengaluru on 12 points. The winner of the DC vs RCB match being played in New Delhi could potentially overtake them and move to the top of the table with 14 points.
Article Summary: Mumbai indians beat lucknow super giants by 54 runs in indian premier league. Captain hardik pandya bowled only one over of the match. Ryan rickelton (58) and suryakumar yadav (54) helped mi post 215 for 7.

Article Title: DC vs RCB, IPL 2025: Why is Phil Salt not playing in Virat Kohli's homecoming match?
Article Text:
Phil Salt and Virat Kohli (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Sachin Tendulkar at 52: Power, Pride, and a Nation‚Äôs Pulse

NEW DELHI: Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) suffered a blow ahead of their crucial clash against Delhi Capitals (DC) at the Arun Jaitley Stadium, with opener Phil Salt ruled out due to fever.Salt, who had taken part in practice on Saturday, looked fine during the session but could not recover fully in time for the match on Sunday.Salt has been a key figure for RCB this season after being bought for a massive Rs 11.5 crore in the auction.In his nine appearances this season, the Englishman has scored 239 runs, including two impressive half-centuries, making him an important part of the team's top order.Also See: DC vs RCB IPL Live Score With Salt unavailable, England‚Äôs Jacob Bethell made his IPL debut for RCB.Captain Rajat Patidar , who won the toss and chose to bowl first, confirmed that Bethell replaced Salt for the game. Patidar added that the wicket looked good for batting and preferred chasing in the conditions.Meanwhile, Delhi Capitals were boosted by the return of Faf du Plessis , who came back after missing four games due to a groin injury.READ ALSO: Father played with Joe Root‚Äôs dad, son to partner Virat Kohli: Jacob Bethell‚Äôs story DC captain Axar Patel mentioned he would have preferred to bat first but was confident about adapting to the conditions as the match progressed.Sunday‚Äôs match is a high-stakes encounter, with the winner set to move to the top of the IPL 2025 points table, ahead of Gujarat Titans. The last time these two teams met, KL Rahul's unbeaten 93 had guided DC to a six-wicket win over RCB.Fans were eager to see Virat Kohli‚Äôs homecoming, but Salt‚Äôs absence adds an unexpected twist to the contest.
Article Summary: Royal challengers bengaluru (rcb) suffered a blow ahead of their crucial clash against delhi capitals (dc) opener phil salt was ruled out due to fever. England‚Äôs jacob bethell made his ipl debut for rcb. Dc captain axar patel mentioned he would have preferred to bat first but was confident about adapting to the conditions as the match progressed.

Article Title: 'Virat Kohli and I have spoken about it so many times in last 5-6 years': KL Rahul opens up on IPL regret
Article Text:
Virat Kohli and KL Rahul (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Sachin Tendulkar at 52: Power, Pride, and a Nation‚Äôs Pulse

NEW DELHI: KL Rahul recently opened up about one of his biggest regrets in the IPL, the 2016 final loss with Royal Challengers Bangalore (now Royal Challengers Bengaluru) against Sunrisers Hyderabad (SRH).Speaking on Star Sports, Rahul revealed that he and Virat Kohli have often discussed that heartbreak over the past five to six years."Virat and I have spoken about it many times. If one of us had played a little longer and won that game, it would have been very different. And winning an IPL is so special. That 2016 season was very special for RCB . We were at the bottom of the table and had to win seven games in a row to qualify, and we did. We went on to win the eliminator and made it to the final," Rahul recalled.Chasing 209, RCB fell just eight runs short, finishing at 200 despite Kohli‚Äôs 54 off 35 balls and Rahul‚Äôs 11 off 9.Also See: DC vs RCB IPL Live Score Rahul reflected on how close they were to scripting a fairy-tale ending. "If one of us had stayed longer, it could have been a very different story. Winning at home in Chinnaswamy would have been unforgettable," he said.Beyond the regret, Rahul spoke about how his time at RCB changed him as a cricketer. Having joined as a youngster, Rahul said he initially lacked belief in his white-ball skills. However, sharing a dressing room with legends like Kohli, AB de Villiers, and Chris Gayle had a massive impact on him."Watching how Virat, AB, and Chris trained and approached the game was the best learning experience. I picked up so much from them ‚Äî from fitness to mental toughness," Rahul said. He credited Kohli‚Äôs fitness journey for inspiring him to take training more seriously, which led to improved consistency across formats."From 2014-15 onwards, I started believing I could succeed in white-ball cricket too," Rahul added, highlighting how RCB laid the foundation for his growth as an international cricketer.
Article Summary: Kl rahul has opened up about one of his biggest regrets in the ipl. Rcb lost to sunrisers hyderabad in the 2016 final. Rahul said he and virat kohli have often discussed that heartbreak. He also spoke about how his time at rcb changed him as a cricketer.

Article Title: Mayank Yadav: Mayank Yadav marks fiery comeback, dismisses Rohit Sharma at Wankhede
Article Text:
Mayank Yadav (IPL Photo)

Also visit:

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Playing XIs

Mumbai Indians:

Lucknow Super Giants:

NEW DELHI: Lucknow Super Giants ‚Äô fast bowler Mayank Yadav made a rousing return to competitive cricket, striking in style by dismissing Rohit Sharma in their IPL clash against Mumbai Indians at the Wankhede Stadium on Sunday.Returning after a long injury layoff, Mayank was handed the new ball by skipper Rishabh Pant and showed no signs of rust. His first over, bowled to Ryan Rickelton, featured four deliveries clocking over 140 kmph. Although Rickelton managed a boundary, Mayank‚Äôs control and sharp pace were impressive after nearly seven months out.The real highlight came in Mayank‚Äôs second over. After Rohit Sharma smashed him for back-to-back sixes ‚Äî a deep square hit followed by a signature pull over square leg ‚Äî the young pacer responded brilliantly. Regaining his composure, Mayank delivered a slower short ball that Rohit steered straight to Prince Yadav at short third man, falling for 12 off five balls.Mayank‚Äôs comeback is significant, given his injury struggles ‚Äî including five stress fractures and a recent toe injury that delayed his return after joining LSG on April 16. His last competitive game was a T20I against Bangladesh in October 2024.Replacing Shardul Thakur in the XI, the 22-year-old's successful return was a major boost for LSG, who elected to field first after winning the toss.Mumbai Indians made two changes themselves, bringing in Karn Sharma and debutant Corbin Bosch.Ryan Rickelton (wk), Rohit Sharma, Will Jacks, Suryakumar Yadav, Tilak Varma, Hardik Pandya (capt), Naman Dhir, Corbin Bosch, Trent Boult, Deepak Chahar, Karn SharmaAiden Markram, Mitchell Marsh, Nicholas Pooran, Rishabh Pant(wk/capt), Abdul Samad, Ayush Badoni, Digvesh Singh Rathi, Ravi Bishnoi, Avesh Khan, Prince Yadav, Mayank Yadav
Article Summary: Lucknow super giants fast bowler mayank yadav made a rousing return to competitive cricket. The 22-year-old dismissed rohit sharma in their ipl clash against mumbai indians at the wankhede stadium on sunday. Mayank‚Äôs comeback is significant, given his injury struggles.

Article Title: 'Yeh nahi sudhrega': Digvesh Rathi can't stop 'notebook' celebration despite hefty fines in IPL 2025
Article Text:
Digvesh Rathi (BCCI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Sachin Tendulkar at 52: Power, Pride, and a Nation‚Äôs Pulse

NEW DELHI: Lucknow Super Giants ‚Äô latest sensation Digvesh Rathi has become a talking point this IPL season. And it is not just for his skills, but for his repeated ‚Äúnotebook‚Äù celebration that has now cost him heavily.Against Mumbai Indians on Sunday at the Wankhede Stadium, Rathi's signature celebration once again stole the show as he dismissed dangerous Ryan Rickelton for 58.Also See: DC vs RCB Live Score IPL 2025 It all started during LSG‚Äôs match against Punjab Kings, when Rathi dismissed opener Priyansh Arya and celebrated by pretending to write in a notebook. While the gesture was playful, match officials found it provocative and unsportsmanlike. As a result, Rathi was fined 25% of his match fee (Rs 1,87,500) and given one demerit point.However, the warning didn‚Äôt deter him.Just four days later, during a match against Mumbai Indians, Rathi once again pulled out the same celebration after dismissing Naman Dhir.This time, the IPL disciplinary committee acted even more firmly, slapping a 50% fine (Rs 3,75,000) and handing him a second Level 1 offence. Rathi‚Äôs demerit points now stand at three for the season.In total, the young spinner has been fined Rs 5,62,500 so far for his controversial celebrations.The incidents have sparked a wide range of reactions on social media.Many fans are enjoying Rathi‚Äôs boldness, while others feel he needs to show more maturity on the field. Memes and jokes flooded platforms, with many users joking, ‚ÄúYeh nahi sudhrega‚Äù (He won‚Äôt change).Despite the growing fines and warnings, Rathi seems unfazed, sticking to the celebration that has now become his signature. While T20 cricket encourages passion and excitement, the IPL has made it clear that celebrations must not cross into disrespect.
Article Summary: Digvesh rathi's 'notebook' celebration has become a talking point this ipl season. Rathi was fined 25% of his match fee and given one demerit point for the gesture. The young spinner has been fined rs 5,62,500 so far for his controversial celebrations.

Article Title: Suryakumar Yadav creates history, becomes fastest Indian to 4000 IPL runs
Article Text:
Mumbai Indians' Suryakumar Yadav plays a shot in Mumbai. (PTI Photo)

Also visit:

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Which aspect of Suryakumar Yadav's game do you admire the most? His consistency His 360-degree strokeplay His strike rate

NEW DELHI: Mumbai Indians‚Äô star batter Suryakumar Yadav added another feather to his illustrious cap on Sunday, becoming the fastest Indian to reach 4000 runs in the history of the Indian Premier League (IPL) in terms of balls faced. The milestone came during Mumbai Indians ' crucial clash against Lucknow Super Giants at the Wankhede Stadium.Suryakumar achieved the landmark in just 2705 balls, maintaining a sensational strike rate of 147.87. His effort places him third overall on the all-time list, trailing only the legendary Chris Gayle (2653 balls) and AB de Villiers (2658 balls). Among Indians, however, he stands alone at the top, underlining his reputation as one of the most destructive batters in modern T20 cricket.Having represented Kolkata Knight Riders and Mumbai Indians across his IPL career, Suryakumar has featured in 160 matches and ammassed 4201 runs at 34 average and almost 150 strike rate. Along the way, he has amassed two centuries and 27 half-centuries, often dazzling fans with his 360-degree strokeplay and fearless approach.Suryakumar‚Äôs form this season has been pivotal to Mumbai Indians' resurgence. With over 400 runs at a staggering strike rate close to 170 and an average over 60, he has now overtaken Gujarat Titans‚Äô Sai Sudharsan (417 runs) to lead the Orange Cap race. His brilliance has been a major factor in MI's four-match winning streak, which has reignited their playoff hopes.Suryakumar scored 54 off 28 balls, with the help of four sixes and four fours, as MI posted a mammoth 215 for 7 against LSG. Suryakumar took his tally to 427 runs in 10 games this season, which included three half-centuries.In the ongoing match, Lucknow Super Giants captain Rishabh Pant won the toss and chose to bowl first, aiming to capitalise on the surface in the day game. Meanwhile, Mumbai Indians skipper Hardik Pandya welcomed the challenge of setting a target, stressing the team‚Äôs focus on maintaining momentum during the business end of the tournament.
Article Summary: Suryakumar yadav becomes the fastest indian to reach 4000 runs in the history of the indian premier league. The milestone came during mumbai indians'crucial clash against lucknow super giants at the wankhede stadium. His effort places him third overall on the all-time list, trailing only the legendary chris gayle (2653 balls) and ab de villiers (2658 balls)

Article Title: Another failure! Rishabh Pant's horror run continues in IPL 2025
Article Text:
Rishabh Pant failed again on Sunday against Mumbai Indians.

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Sachin Tendulkar at 52: Power, Pride, and a Nation‚Äôs Pulse

Rishabh Pant's miserable form continued as he fell for a 2-ball four against Mumbai Indians at the Wankhede Stadium on Sunday.Pant played a reverse sweep straight to short third man. It was a poor shot from the Lucknow Super Giants captain.It was a full ball from Will Jacks on the stumps. Pant went low, looking to scoop it for a reverse sweep, a shot that wasn't required, and ended up mistiming it, chipping it straight to Karn Sharma.Pant is having a difficult season so far, with only 110 runs in ten games, including a knock of 63. These numbers are quite low for a player of his stature. If he fails to find his rhythm, this will be the first time since 2016 that he scores less than 200 runs in an IPL season.In his comeback season last year, he amassed 446 runs for Delhi Capitals in 13 games and also scored three half-centuries.Pant was acquired by LSG for ‚Çπ27 crore in last year's auction, becoming the most expensive player in the league's history.Earlier, Mumbai Indians rode on half-centuries by Ryan Rickelton (58) and Suryakumar Yadav (54) to reach a challenging 215/7 in 20 overs against Lucknow Super Giants in Match 45 of the IPL.Rickelton gave the innings an early push with a half-century off 25 balls after MI were asked to bat first by LSG skipper Rishabh Pant. Suryakumar Yadav then provided further momentum with a typically innovative 54 off 28 balls, becoming the highest scorer of the season with 417 runs in 10 innings.In scorching hot conditions made worse by high humidity, Rickelton caught fire from the second over, storming to his fifty in just 25 balls and scoring the season's fastest half-century for the Mumbai Indians, who are on a four-match unbeaten run in IPL 2025.Meanwhile, Suryakumar Yadav on Sunday became the second fastest to reach 4000 runs by balls faced in the IPL.For LSG, Mayank Yadav and Avesh Khan claimed two wickets each, with figures of 2-40 and 2-42 respectively, while Prince Yadav, Digvesh Rathi, and Ravi Bishnoi each bagged a wicket.
Article Summary: Rishabh pant fell for a 2-ball four against mumbai indians on sunday. Lucknow super giants skipper is having a difficult season so far. Suryakumar yadav became the second fastest to reach 4000 runs by balls faced in the ipl. Ryan rickelton (58) scored the season's fastest half-century for mi.

Article Title: Sanjiv Goenka memes flood internet again after Rishabh Pant flop show
Article Text:
Sanjiv Goenka and Rishabh Pant

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Sachin Tendulkar at 52: Power, Pride, and a Nation‚Äôs Pulse

NEW DELHI: Rishabh Pant ‚Äôs struggles with the bat continued as he fell cheaply once again, this time against the Mumbai Indians at Wankhede Stadium on Sunday.Pant managed just four runs off two balls before playing a poor shot that ended his stay. Trying a risky reverse sweep off Will Jacks, he mistimed it completely and handed an easy catch to Karn Sharma at short third man.Pant, captaining the Lucknow Super Giants this season, has found it tough going.He has scored only 110 runs in 10 matches, with just one notable innings of 63 runs. With these numbers, Pant is staring at what could be his lowest IPL return since 2016.Also See: DC vs RCB IPL Live Score After a strong comeback season last year, where he piled up 446 runs for Delhi Capitals, expectations were high, especially after LSG signed him for Rs 27 crore, making him the most expensive player in IPL history.Pant's failure triggered a wave of memes featuring Sanjiv Goenka , the LSG co-owner, across social media.Meanwhile, Mumbai Indians put up a strong total of 215/7, thanks to explosive half-centuries from Ryan Rickelton (58 off 25) and Suryakumar Yadav (54 off 28).Rickelton smashed the season‚Äôs fastest half-century for MI, while Suryakumar became the season‚Äôs highest scorer with 417 runs in 10 innings.LSG‚Äôs bowlers struggled under the Mumbai heat and humidity, though Mayank Yadav and Avesh Khan managed two wickets each. Prince Yadav, Digvesh Rathi, and Ravi Bishnoi chipped in with a wicket apiece, but it wasn‚Äôt enough to halt MI's charge.With Pant‚Äôs form dipping and LSG's playoff hopes in question, the pressure is clearly mounting -- both on the field and across the internet.
Article Summary: Rishabh pant fails to make an impact as lucknow super giants lose to mumbai indians. He managed just four runs off two balls before playing a poor shot that ended his stay. Mumbai indians put up a strong total of 215/7, thanks to explosive half-centuries from ryan rickelton (58 off 25) and suryakumar yadav (54 off 28).

Article Title: Mumbai Indians create history, become first IPL team to record ...
Article Text:
Mumbai Indians players after the win at Wankhede stadium. (Pic credit: IPL)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Do you think Mumbai Indians will secure their sixth IPL title this season? No Yes

Sachin Tendulkar at 52: Power, Pride, and a Nation‚Äôs Pulse

NEW DELHI: Five-time champions Mumbai Indians etched their name deeper into Indian Premier League history on Sunday, becoming the first team to register 150 victories in the tournament's history.Under the leadership of Hardik Pandya , MI cruised past Rishabh Pant‚Äôs Lucknow Super Giants with a dominant 54-run win at the Wankhede Stadium .With this triumph, Mumbai Indians now have 150 wins and 121 losses from 271 matches, further cementing their status as the most successful team in IPL history .The victory was also MI's fifth on the trot this season, propelling them to second place in the ten-team points table with 12 points from 10 games (six wins and four defeats).In the list of most wins in IPL, fellow five-time champions Chennai Super Kings (140 wins from 248 matches) sit second, followed by three-time champions Kolkata Knight Riders (134 wins from 261 matches), Royal Challengers Bengaluru (129 wins from 266 matches), and Delhi Capitals (121 wins from 261 matches).Punjab Kings (117 wins) and Rajasthan Royals (114 wins) are the other franchises to have crossed the 100-win mark.Earlier, after being sent in to bat by LSG skipper Rishabh Pant, MI rode on fiery fifties from Suryakumar Yadav (54 off 28 balls) and Ryan Rickelton (58 off 32 balls) to post a strong 215 for 7. Jasprit Bumrah then starred with the ball, picking up 4/22, as Mumbai bowled out Lucknow for 161 in 20 overs to seal a commanding win.This was also Mumbai's first-ever league stage victory against LSG in seven attempts, having beaten them previously only once, during the Eliminator in IPL 2023.
Article Summary: Mumbai indians beat lucknow super giants by 54 runs at the wankhede stadium. The victory was mi's fifth on the trot this season, propelling them to second place in the ten-team points table with 12 points from 10 games. Mumbai now have 150 wins and 121 losses from 271 matches, cementing their status as the most successful team in ipl history.
